content.description: From down low, climb out the pockets on the underbelly, right of the twisted juniper tree on the west face.
Start on a huge hold farthest right on the west face. Move up and to the right utilizing some "bumps" and fun slopers.
content.location:
This is the line farthest right. Start on a huge hold that marks the start of

Supper Left

and right.

content.description: Start on a huge hold and move up left of the bulge to good rails and a good topout.
content.location:
This is the line second farthest right. A huge hold marks the start of Supper Left and

Right

.

content.description:
This is a variation of

Supper Right

which goes up over the lip and up.  Supercarrier starts from the large jug beneath the overhang and traverses right around the corner and overhang where it goes up utilizing the bumps.  The problem offers a chance to warm-up before hitting the boulder's tougher problems.
content.location:
This has the same start as

Supper Right

, and it is located on the wall's far right west face.

content.description: Climb up the center of the face using pockets. Start on a bad 2 handed crimp that you really have to get under to hold onto.
content.location: This is in the middle of the west face.

content.description:
Same as

Super Supper

- but eliminate using the pockets via making huge moves to sloper crimps. You really have to stay tight and dial your feet in to get anything out the holds.
content.location:
Start the same as

Super Supper

- in the middle of the west face.

content.description: Start on a big "bubble" - double heel hook, match your foot up high on the start hold - whatever. But move out to a small crimp and a small pocket, just make sure your feet dont peal. Move through good crimps to top out.
content.location:
This is the second leftmost line - to the right of

Tiers Away

.

content.description: Brunch starts with two crimps and a sit start with your feet farther to the left. Move delicately up the face to a crimp with the right hand and then cross the left hand into the crimp beside it. From there, move up to the rail and then better crimps to top out.
content.location:
The problem is located to the left of the

Supper Right

and

Supper Left

problems. There is a small rail with good crimp on in and another crimp a couple of inches above it. That's the starting hold.

content.description:
This problem starts the same way

Tiers Away

does, but goes up, traverses right a bit and ends where

The Bubble

ends.

As far as I can tell, the crux is going to be getting a left hand on crimp right beside your right hand 2-3 finger pocket and moving up to a sharp crimp.
content.location: This is located on the left side of the main face of the Superchief Boulder.

content.description:
Breakfast at 4 AM starts the same as

Brunch

working up the crimps to the middle of the wall. From there, move to a great crimp with the right hand and a pitiful gaston with the left hand. Lean hard on the left hand and get a right foot up. From there, grab the next crimp and top out.
content.protection: Great landing, but I recommend a pad and a spotter.
content.location:
This is just left of the Supper problems and starts the same as

Brunch

. You can downclimb off either side.
